narrative.inOrderTo: assert that the basic functionality of https://www.disasterassistance.gov/es/ is working
narrative.iWantTo:
run the daily regressions at least twice a day
Meta: @skip

scenario.title: (Spanish) Homepage - Header - All the menu links on the "Get Assistance" tab

examples.step: Given I am on the Spanish Disaster Assistance homepage
When I click on the <menuLinks> in the Get Assistance tab
Then the <menuLinks> page should open correctly
Given I am on the Spanish Disaster Assistance homepage
When I click on the buscador de direcciónes in the Get Assistance tab
Then the buscador de direcciónes page should open correctly
Given I am on the Spanish Disaster Assistance homepage
When I click on the encontrar ayuda in the Get Assistance tab
Then the encontrar ayuda page should open correctly
Given I am on the Spanish Disaster Assistance homepage
When I click on the solicitar asistencia in the Get Assistance tab
Then the solicitar asistencia page should open correctly
Given I am on the Spanish Disaster Assistance homepage
When I click on the revisar estatus in the Get Assistance tab
Then the revisar estatus page should open correctly
Given I am on the Spanish Disaster Assistance homepage
When I click on the formas de asistencia in the Get Assistance tab
Then the formas de asistencia page should open correctly
Given I am on the Spanish Disaster Assistance homepage
When I click on the otra ayuda para recuperación in the Get Assistance tab
Then the otra ayuda para recuperación page should open correctly
Given I am on the Spanish Disaster Assistance homepage
When I click on the líderes comunitarios in the Get Assistance tab
Then the líderes comunitarios page should open correctly
examples.example: {menuLinks=lista de verificación para aplicarse, category=daily, skip=}
examples.step: Given I am on the Spanish Disaster Assistance homepage
When I click on the lista de verificación para aplicarse in the Get Assistance tab
Then the lista de verificación para aplicarse page should open correctly
Given I am on the Spanish Disaster Assistance homepage
When I click on the formularios in the Get Assistance tab
Then the formularios page should open correctly

scenario.title: (Spanish) Homepage - Key Links - Main links on homepage to assert that the Spanish pages open correctly

examples.step: Given I am on the Spanish Disaster Assistance homepage
When I click on <mainLinksItem> within the main links bar
Then the <mainLinksItem> page should open correctly
Given I am on the Spanish Disaster Assistance homepage
When I click on encontrar ayuda within the main links bar
Then the encontrar ayuda page should open correctly
Given I am on the Spanish Disaster Assistance homepage
When I click on solicitar asistencia within the main links bar
Then the solicitar asistencia page should open correctly
Given I am on the Spanish Disaster Assistance homepage
When I click on revisar estatus within the main links bar
Then the revisar estatus page should open correctly

scenario.title: (Spanish) Homepage - Currently declared disasters - States in the Spanish declared disaster map are clickable
scenario.step: Given I am on the Spanish Disaster Assistance homepage
When I am viewing the declared disaster map
Then states with disasters should be clickable

scenario.title: (Spanish) Homepage - Currently declared disasters - The declared states on the declared disaster map
scenario.step: Given I am on the Spanish Disaster Assistance homepage
When I am viewing the declared disaster map
Then states with disasters should be clickable
Then I should be able to view the list of the declared states in Spanish

scenario.title: (Spanish) Homepage - Find Local Resources flows correctly in Spanish
scenario.step: Given I am on the Spanish Disaster Assistance homepage
When I am attempting to find local resources
Then information on resources should be visible

scenario.title: (Spanish) News Feeds - All of the titles on the page
scenario.step: Given I am on the Spanish Disaster Assistance homepage
When I am on the Spanish News Feeds landing page node
Then all of the spanish sub-titles should show on the page

scenario.title: (Spanish) Community Leaders - Results of the quick search items

examples.step: Given I am on the spanish Community Leaders page on Disaster Assistance
When I click on a <quickSearch> item on the Community Leaders page
Then the results should include the search words for that item

values.value: Infraestructura, servicios públicos y otra asistencia pública

examples.example: {quickSearch=Infraestructura, servicios públicos y otra asistencia pública, category=NWD, skip=}
examples.step: Given I am on the spanish Community Leaders page on Disaster Assistance
When I click on a Infraestructura, servicios públicos y otra asistencia pública item on the Community Leaders page
Then the results should include the search words for that item
Given I am on the spanish Community Leaders page on Disaster Assistance
When I click on a Preparación para la comunidad item on the Community Leaders page
Then the results should include the search words for that item
examples.example: {quickSearch=Recursos para recuperación de desastre, category=NWD, skip=}
examples.step: Given I am on the spanish Community Leaders page on Disaster Assistance
When I click on a Recursos para recuperación de desastre item on the Community Leaders page
Then the results should include the search words for that item
examples.example: {quickSearch=Viviendas y refugios de emergencia, category=NWD, skip=}
examples.step: Given I am on the spanish Community Leaders page on Disaster Assistance
When I click on a Viviendas y refugios de emergencia item on the Community Leaders page
Then the results should include the search words for that item
Given I am on the spanish Community Leaders page on Disaster Assistance
When I click on a ¿Como puede ayudar? item on the Community Leaders page
Then the results should include the search words for that item

scenario.title: (Spanish) Homepage - Address Look-Up - Declared disasters
scenario.step: Given I am on the declared disasters DAC page
When I type the declared disaster into the address look-up bar in Spanish
Then I should get the results for the given disaster

scenario.title: (Spanish) Address Look-Up - Declared disasters
scenario.step: Given I am on the declared disasters DAC page
When I type the declared disaster into the address look-up bar from the Address Look-Up page in Spanish
Then I should get the results for the given disaster

scenario.title: (Spanish) Find Assistance - Spanish benefits results display according to use cases
scenario.step: Given I am on the Find Assistance Spanish page
When I choose only Employment
Then I should obtain 9 results and see all the content under the accordions

scenario.title: (Spanish) Find Assistance - Dynamically verify results of the questionnaire
scenario.step: Given I am on the Find Assistance Spanish page
When I fully complete the questionnaire
Then I should accumulate the same number of results as the text on the Get Results button in Spanish

scenario.title: (Spanish) Find Assistance - All the functionality of the FOA questionnaire
scenario.step: Given I am on the Find Assistance Spanish page
When I fully complete the questionnaire
Then I should be able to see all of the content in Spanish
When I click next
Then the 3 accordions should have content visible
When I click apply now in Spanish
Then the DAC page should load

scenario.title: (Spanish) News Feeds - FEMA Twitter feed is present
scenario.step: When I am on the Spanish News Feeds landing page node
When I am viewing the FEMA Twitter feed
Then the most recent tweets should be displayed

scenario.title: (Spanish) Forms of Assistance - Category Type filter with the first seven types
scenario.step: Given I am on the Spanish Forms of Assistance page
When I click on Category Type to check the first seven category types
Then 42 spanish results should appear

scenario.title: (Spanish) Forms of Assistance - Category Type filter with the next eight types
scenario.step: Given I am on the Spanish Forms of Assistance page
When I click on Category Type to check the next eight category types
Then 53 spanish results should appear

scenario.title: (Spanish) Forms of Assistance - Federal Agency filter with the first seven types
scenario.step: Given I am on the Spanish Forms of Assistance page
When I click on Federal Agency to check the first seven federal agencies
Then 40 spanish results should appear

scenario.title: (Spanish) Forms of Assistance - Federal Agency filter with the next seven types
scenario.step: Given I am on the Spanish Forms of Assistance page
When I click on Federal Agency to check the next seven federal agencies
Then 37 spanish results should appear
